text: Good Luck Chuck is a 2007 romantic comedy movie starring Jessica Alba and Dane Cook. The story of the movie is Chuck is a "good luck charm" lover. That is, women will find their "one true love" after having sex with him. He then meets a girl who he thinks is his true love. ==Sources== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2007 romantic comedy movies Category:2000s sex comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies about dentistry
title: Good Luck Chuck
